---

Type guard to validate User objects at runtime using Zod

## Import

```ts
import { isValidUser } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Parameters

### obj

`any`

- The object to validate as a User

## Returns

`obj is User`
True if the object is a valid User, false otherwise
